name: I'm Going to Build My Own Theme Park

text: i'm going to build my own theme park

description: A frame from the animated series 'Futurama', where the robot Bender says: 'I'll build my own amusement park with blackjack and hookers!'. Used as a template for jokes about creating an alternative version of something due to dissatisfaction with the original.

query_examples.query: Not hacks, but advanced architectural solutions
The Chief Rabbi of Russia named his favorite rapper — it's Djigan.
captions: I'll create my own rap festival

name: Why Shouldn't I Keep It
description: Two frames from 'The Lord of the Rings' movie, where Bilbo Baggins holds the ring and with a suspicious/greedy expression puts on the Ring of Power. Used for jokes about reluctance to share something or part with something.

query_examples.query: Twilight memes

name: American Chopper Argument

text: Scandinavia is socialist and they're doing great!
They're not socialist. They're capitalist with strong welfare policies!

description: The meme consists of 6 panels with screenshots from the reality show American Chopper, where father and son Teutul emotionally argue. The format is used to depict various disputes, where each panel contains a new argument from the discussion participants. There are two arguers, their lines alternate.

query_examples.query: My husband doesn't understand how I, a Russian person, can eat avocado
captions: Well, potatoes are from South America!
Like tomatoes and cucumbers from Asia

name: Distracted Boyfriend
description: A meme based on a stock photo taken by Spanish photographer Antonio Guillem. The photo depicts three people: a guy walking hand in hand with a girl but demonstratively turning around to look at another girl; his girlfriend looking at his behavior with indignation; and the girl in red passing by, whom the guy is staring at. The meme is used to illustrate various situations related to choice, infidelity, or shifting attention. The first caption is on the girl in red, the second caption is on the guy, the third caption is on the upset girlfriend.

name: Daily Struggle

text: Get enough sleep before an important meeting

description: At the top of the meme is a panel with two red buttons. The bottom panel shows a character in red clothes who is nervous and wiping sweat from his forehead, experiencing stress from the need to choose. The first two captions are for the buttons, the last one is for additional description of the situation (optional).

captions: Explain why their opinion is wrong with 40 proofs

query_examples.query: I love TV series
captions: Get enough sleep before an important meeting

name: Elmo Choosing Cocaine
description: Frames with a 'Sesame Street' character. First frame: Elmo sits at a table with fruits and white powder (presumably flour/sugar for comic effect). Second frame: Elmo lies face down in this powder, thus choosing it. The meme is used for jokes about addiction to something or excessive enthusiasm for something. It's important to note that this is a comedy meme with a children's toy, and the white powder in the original video is a harmless substance like flour or sugar, used to create a comic effect. The first and last captions are for fruits, they should match. The second caption is for Elmo. The third caption is for the powder.

query_examples.query: Tisha is like winning the lottery, he can ignore for a week or engage in a 3-hour conversation
Our power is only over our thoughts, words and actions. That's our responsibility. The rest is not.
captions: Taking responsibility for everything and everyone

name: Galaxy Brain
description: A four-panel meme showing progression. It starts with a regular portrait of a human head, then goes to images of a glowing brain, becoming brighter, the last panels show a cosmic brain. The humor is built on the fact that the stupidest ideas are presented as the most 'enlightened'.

captions: Move with the garden to Sochi

name: Grant Gustin Next To Oliver Queen's Grave
description: A photo from a TV series shoot, where actor Grant Gustin stands smiling and leaning on the tombstone of Oliver Queen character from the 'Arrow' series. Due to the unfortunate context (smiling at a grave), the photo became a meme. The first caption is on the tombstone, the second caption is on the grave itself (not required, almost never used), the third caption is on the actor.

query_examples.query: Igor, Nikita and Diana are figuring out the rules of the Nemesis game for the fourth hour and can't start playing. Meanwhile, Artem is tearing menisci in the gym
captions: Others who are still reading the Nemesis rules

query_examples.query: bible

name: Gru's Plan
description: A four-panel meme where the main character of the 'Despicable Me' movie, Gru, uses a presentation board. In the third panel, an unexpected presentation slide appears, followed by a panel where Gru looks back at the board in confusion. The content of the third and fourth captions should match. The joke is in the deception of expectations.

query_examples.query: Become kind, Lisa

name: Perfection

text: I prefer the real Darth Vader.
I said, the real Darth Vader.

description: The 'Perfection' comic with Fassbender as Magneto consists of 6 squares and is always structured in the same way. In the first panel there is some picture, to the right of it is Fassbender, who says 'I want to see the real one'. In the second panel is a similar picture, and Fassbender says 'I said the real one!'. Finally, in the third panel, another similar picture appears, and a satisfied Fassbender says 'Perfection!'.

name: Tuxedo Winnie the Pooh

text: I work part-time in the fast food industry

description: A meme featuring two images of Winnie the Pooh: a simple, classic image of the bear at the top and Winnie the Pooh in a tuxedo with a haughty/aristocratic expression at the bottom. The meme is used to compare ordinary and 'pretentious' versions of the same concept, where the second option represents a more complex, fancy, or 'intellectual' version of the first.

name: Phoebe Teaching Joey
description: A meme from Friends. In the original, polyglot Phoebe tries to teach Joey French. After conducting several trial lessons, Buffay realized that Tribbiani was not a good student, so she suggested he learn individual phrases syllable by syllable. But in the end, Joey produces a completely different phrase.

name: Woman Yelling at a Cat

text: Mom telling me how useless I am

description: Left: a frame from a reality show where Taylor Armstrong emotionally shouts and points, while her friend tries to calm her down. Right: a photo of a white cat named Smudge, who sits at a table with a plate of salad and looks confused/displeased. The meme went viral due to the funny contrast between the woman's aggressive shouting and the confused/indifferent expression on the cat's face. It's usually used to create dialogues where the first person emotionally proves something, and the cat imperturbably responds or just puzzled.

name: Epic Handshake
description: A macro meme with a handshake of muscular black and white arms. The meme is used to demonstrate unexpected unanimity of usually dissimilar individuals or groups on some particular issue – often on the ground of common dislike for a third group. The third caption is usually some action.

query_examples.query: Wanted to become a senior, now I want to become a neural network
captions: Seniors who can't explain how they solve problems
Neural networks that can't explain how they solve problems
